issue.title: [Python] Split in multiple files + clean-up pyarrow.parquet tests
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9027](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9027). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The current `test_parquet.py` file is already above 4000 lines of code, and it is becoming a bit unwieldy to work with. 
Better structuring it, and maybe splitting it in multiple files, would help (separate test files could cover tests for basic reading/writing, tests for metadata/statistics objects, tests for multi-file datasets)
